item.title: Movie Plix
item.description: Project 2: Social Website For Movies This is social site website for movie buffs where a user can create his/her account, post their blogs, comment on others posts , give a review for the movies as well give a rating for them. The website has three section: Movie Page Section one has all the movies where in there’s movies descritpion, a trailer, movie’s default imdb rating and user’s rating if any.

item.title: Generating Art With GANs
item.description: Final Image resulted from GANs Deep neural networks are used mainly for supervised learning: classification or regression. Generative Adversarial Networks or GANs, however, use neural networks for a very different purpose: Generative modeling While there are many approaches used for generative modeling, a Generative Adversarial Network takes the following approach: GANs model There are two neural networks: a Generator and a Discriminator. The generator generates a “fake” sample given a random vector/matrix, and the discriminator attempts to detect whether a given sample is “real” (picked from the training data) or “fake” (generated by the generator).

item.title: Image Captioner
item.description: Image Captioner Image Captioner takes in any image and produces a caption based on whats in the image. This is build using Deep Learning and the application is build using Flask framework. The model is a combination of CNN and LSTM. The model is trained on both image and it’s respective caption. The CNN model ( transfer learning is used here specifically vgg16 ) helps to extract the image patterns into some vector and the words in the caption is converted into index no and then it is feed into a word embedding.

item.title: Youtube Video Analyzer
item.description: Youtube Video Analyzer; GUI built using Tkinter This is a Data Science cum python project Data Extraction using Web Scraping & Youtube API : This was the challenging part where required data needed to be extracted. I have used selenium as well beautiful to scrap data from youtube. Some datas like comments cannot be scrapped , for that I used Youtube API to extract some number of comments from videos.
